title: Urf is down
body:
Dear Community,
we are in a Urf game but it doesn´t start.
Pls fix the bug
we wont leave because than we have a ban.

replies.body: Same here and if you leave you will be led to the "you left a running game" page on the next lock in
yes rly my game dont start too
Get the same Problem. All picked theyr champs, but it don't start. If we leave, we get a ban. So pls Riot fix it. It can't be that we get the trouble for Server Problems. Thanks
